name: Richard DEVEREAUX, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Devereaux v. Commonwealth, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Richard DEVEREAUX, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The order of the Commonwealth Court is reversed, and the matter is remanded to the Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole for reconsideration in light of Rivenbark v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, 509 Pa. 248, 501 A.2d 1110 (1985).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Frederick I. Huganir, Public Defender’s Office, Carlisle, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
511 A.2d 1345
Richard DEVEREAUX, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 9, 1986.
Frederick I. Huganir, Public Defender’s Office, Carlisle, for petitioner.
